H0.text: Between 1956 and 1968, the American athlete Al oerter won four consecutive Olympic gold medals in which filed event. Javelin

H1.text: Between 1956 and 1968, the American athlete Al oerter won four consecutive Olympic gold medals in which filed event. Shot Put

H2.text: Between 1956 and 1968, the American athlete Al oerter won four consecutive Olympic gold medals in which filed event. High Jump

H3.text: Between 1956 and 1968, the American athlete Al oerter won four consecutive Olympic gold medals in which filed event. DISCUS

A4.text: Oerter was a four-time Olympic Champion in the discus throw.

A5.text: He was the first athlete to win a gold medal in the same individual event in four consecutive Olympic Games.
